analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika sappi itika duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasappītiko
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sappītikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sappītikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sappītikam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na sappītikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham sappītikam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappītiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappītiko
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na sappītikaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na sappītikaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naappītiko
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham appītikam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na appītikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham appītikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na appītikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham appītikam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naappītiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naappītiko ca dhammā
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na appītikaḥ ca na anidassana sa paṭighaḥ na appītikaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
